sentences.en: Features: Lightly and ingeniously structured, easy for application , strong magnetic Attraction power and safe in handling.
sentences.cn: 结构特点: 结构轻巧, 操作方便, 吸附力强,安全可靠.

sentences.en: In the midst of these variations the theme was always ingeniously and excitingly retrieved.
sentences.cn: 这些话题在令人应接不暇地转换着,但总是能得到鼓舞人心的巧妙的补充.

sentences.en: Ingeniously, Chrome itself need not take a lot of market share to fulfil Google's objectives.
sentences.cn: 非常明智, 谷歌不需要铬元素占有市场来实现自己的目标.

sentences.en: It also suggests that hydraulic shock could be reduced by ingeniously designing hydraulic loop.
sentences.cn: 列举了通过对液压回路的巧妙设计,降低液压冲击的例子.

sentences.en: Its modern, fashion, artistic, natural and practical design ingeniously embellishes and grows artistic life taste.
sentences.cn: 安邦的造型时尚, 美观大方, 新颖实用,巧妙地为您点缀和衍生艺术的生活品味.

sentences.en: More than 40 landscapes were ingeniously separated by latticed walls, winding corridors, and lattice windows.
sentences.cn: 40多个景观被巧妙分开的,由网墙, 蜿蜒的走廊, 和格子窗户.

sentences.en: The ingeniously engineered Trojan horse was also his idea.
sentences.cn: 那个天才的特洛伊木马同样也是他的主意.

sentences.en: The plot of the film is ingeniously conceived.
The plot of the story is ingeniously conceived.
sentences.cn: 故事情节的构思相当巧妙.

sentences.en: These gardens ingeniously combine hills, waters, buildings, trees and flowers.
sentences.cn: 这些园林把山 、 水 、 建筑和草木巧妙地组合起来.

sentences.en: They ingeniously conflated other characters and incidents to provide an op é ra - comique setting ( Andrew Porter )
sentences.cn: 他们巧妙地把一些人物或事件揉合到一起编出一幕喜剧 ( 安德烈波特 )

sentences.en: They ingeniously conflated other characters and incidents to provide an opera - comique setting.
sentences.cn: 他们巧妙地把一些人物或事件揉合到一起编出一幕喜剧.

sentences.en: They're not big but they ingeniously combine hills, waters, buildings, trees and flowers.
sentences.cn: 它们不大但是把山 、 水 、 建筑 、 树木和花有机结合.

sentences.en: This is cave experts'ingeniously - designed in - cave drift project by making use of the underground flow.
sentences.cn: 这是洞穴专家巧妙利用暗河水势设置的洞内漂流项目.

sentences.en: Yes. This temple was built ingeniously.
sentences.cn: 嗯,那座庙建造得还很巧妙呢.

words.tran_cn: 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的
